name: Grand Story
description:
In Grand Story, you are playing as an older lady living in a rural area. Apart from doing your daily routine, you are also waiting for a letter from a grandson.

Use WASD for movement and "E" or mouse buttons for interactions.

The game takes about ~15 minutes to complete.

The game was done during G4C + GGJ Serious Game Jam by:

Oleksii Netrebenko - Level Design, Programming

Andriy Bychkovskyi - Game Design, Programming
